links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..900
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (11,8).
mathematica: Join[{a=0,b=1},Table[c=11*b+8*a;a=b;b=c,{n,60}]] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jan 31 2011*)LinearRecurrence[{11, 8}, {0, 1}, 30] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 22 2012 *)
prog: (Sage) [lucas_number1(n,11,-8) for n in xrange(0, 18)]# [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Apr 27 2009](MAGMA) [n le 2 select n-1 else 11*Self(n-1) + 8*Self(n-2): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 22 2012
